abstract: Royalty Pharma sweetened its offer on Monday for Elan, the Irish drug company, on the same day that Elan announced two acquisitions, a spinoff, a share buyback and an $800 million bond issue as it sought to fend off the takeover attempt.
snippet: Royalty Pharma sweetened its offer on Monday for Elan, the Irish drug company, on the same day that Elan announced two acquisitions, a spinoff, a share buyback and an $800 million bond issue as it sought to fend off the takeover attempt.

headline.main: Royalty Pharma Raises Bid for a Resistant Elan
